pros: Most of the coworkers are awesome.
good program for the children who attend

job_title: Teacher Assistant in Saint Joseph, MI
pros: If you absolutely love kids no matter how they behave
cons: Never know when you get a break

Management is the worst!  They selfish and don't care about the staff...   I worked there for 10 years and couldn't even get paid $8.00 so I could Afford my own place to raise my daughter. They had me on maternity leave with no pay.  The staff can't even afford the day care services for their own children to go there.  They even gave me a hard time to repair my car window after their lawn service broke it...  I serve the company faithfully for 10 years and was never advanced or eligible for a higher position and then they put me on the do not re hire list .....  This company is a waste of space on any resume.

review_title: That you work very hard and very little pay and you are not respected
pros: Good education staff. That is all have to say as far as being positive. They do not deserve to be well spoken of because they suck as a company. Just being honest
cons: You can't move up here. I suggest no one work here unless, you have second support system. You will not succeed in this company. They use you and backstab you at the same time. They change your pay without you knowing. They will work you to the bone. They do not care about your wellbeing. Let this ( if you call it one) job be your last last result.

job_title: School Bus Driver in Franklin, VA
pros: Wonderful staff, busy work weeks, benefits, working with children
cons: Working with children can be challenging; specific rules and regulations are different than what many are used to.
